references.paper_title: Optimal rates for regularization of statistical inverse learning problems
references.reason: This paper provides optimal rates for regularization of statistical inverse problems, a fundamental topic in the paper’s study of vector-valued spectral learning algorithms.

references.paper_title: Optimal rates for the regularized least-squares algorithm
references.reason: This paper establishes optimal learning rates for the regularized least-squares algorithm, a key algorithm investigated in the context of vector-valued regression.

references.paper_title: Optimal rates for regularized conditional mean embedding learning
references.reason: This paper provides optimal learning rates for regularized conditional mean embeddings, which is closely related to the vector-valued regression problems studied in this work.

references.paper_title: Towards optimal Sobolev norm rates for the vector-valued regularized least-squares algorithm
references.reason: This paper focuses on the optimal learning rates of the vector-valued regularized least-squares algorithm, directly addressing the core problem of this study.

references.paper_title: Optimal rates for spectral algorithms with least-squares regression over Hilbert spaces
references.reason: This paper derives optimal learning rates for spectral algorithms with least-squares regression over Hilbert spaces, providing a theoretical foundation for the analysis of vector-valued spectral learning algorithms.
